error_scratch_program_not_accessible_any: Whoops! Data of this program is not accessible any more!
error_scratch_project_data_not_available: Whoops! Some data could not be loaded from this Scratch program. Please try again later!
error_request_timeout: Whoops! Our server is not reachable at the moment, please try later!
error_scratch_program_conversion_failed: Whoops! Failed to convert Scratch program, please try again later!
error_specific_scratch_program_conversio: Whoops! Failed to convert %1$s, please try again later!
error_scratch_converter_outdated_pocketc: Your Pocket Code app is outdated. Our Scratch converter only supports the latest Pocket Code version. Please update it on the Google Play Store!
error_cannot_open_not_existing_scratch_p: Cannot open this Scratch program. It seems that you have canceled the conversion/download of the Scratch program or you have renamed/deleted the program in the meanwhile!
error_cannot_open_currently_downloading_: Cannot open this Scratch program while it is downloading! Please try again later!
error_cannot_open_not_yet_downloaded_scr: Cannot open this Scratch program since it has not been downloaded yet! Please try again later!
error_cannot_convert_deprecated_scratch_: Cannot convert %1$s! Older Scratch before %2$s programs are not supported!
error_cannot_convert_more_than_x_program: Cannot convert more than %d program/s simultaneously!
error_cannot_open_failed_scratch_program: Cannot open Scratch program because the conversion failed!
connection_lost_or_closed_by_server: Connection lost or closed by server!
connection_failed: Connection to server failed, please retry later!
authentication_failed: Authentication failed, please contact the Pocket Code team!
status_waiting_for_worker: Looking for a free worker… Please wait…

dialog_terms_of_use_info: In order to be allowed to use Pocket Code and other executables offered by the Catrobat project, you must agree to our Terms of use and services and strictly follow them when you use Pocket Code and our other executables. Please see the link below for their precise formulation.
dialog_terms_of_use_link_text_parrot_rem: Pocket Code terms of use and services
dialog_terms_of_use_parrot_reminder_text: You attempt to use Pocket Code together with Parrot's AR.Drone. We strongly remind you to abide to Parrot's terms of use and services for the drone and to Catrobat's terms of use for Pocket Code.
dialog_about_license_info:
Pocket Code is a programming environment and interpreter for Android devices for the visual programming language Catrobat.

The source code of Pocket Code is mainly licensed under the GNU AGPL v3 License. For further details on the license see the link below.

notification_low_battery: Attention. Battery is low. Current status =
drone_emergency_camera: One or more camera(s) is not responding.
drone_emergency_angle: AR.Drone euler angles went too high. Motors shutdown to prevent bad behaviors.
drone_emergency_cutout: One or more motor(s) was stopped by environment.
drone_alert_battery_low: Battery is too low to take-off again.
drone_alert_ultrasound: Ultrasound sensor can't determine AR.Drone altitude.
drone_alert_vision: No speed estimation from bottom facing camera.
error_no_writiable_external_storage_avai:
Pocket Code requires writable external storage like a SD card in order to run, but none was found.
You can fix this by making the external storage writable or inserting a SD card, then try again.
error_scene_not_deleted: An error occurred while deleting a scene.
error_scene_not_copied: An error occurred while copying a scene.
error_scene_backpack: An error occurred in scene backpack.
error_delete_project: An error while deleting the program occurred
error_unknown_project: A program with that name does not exist.

error_project_download: An error occurred while downloading the program.
error_new_project: An error occurred while creating a new program.
error_rename_project: An error occurred while renaming the program before upload.
error_rename_scene: An error occurred while renaming the scene.
error_load_project: An error occurred while loading the program.
error_screenshot_failed: An error occurred while saving the preview image.
error_load_image: An error occurred while loading the image.
error_load_image_special_chars: Cannot load image. Does the filename contain special characters (e.g. $, %, &, …)?
error_load_sound: An error occurred while loading the sound.
error_internet_connection: An unknown error occurred. Check your Internet connection.
error_project_compatability: The program is not compatible with this version of Pocket Code.
error_outdated_pocketcode_version: The Pocket Code version is outdated. Update now?
error_copy_project: An error occurred while copying the program.
error_upload_project_with_default_name: You cannot upload a program with the name 'My first program'. Please rename the program.
error_upload_default_project: You cannot upload this program because it is the same as 'My first program'. Please modify it, and try again.
error_adding_brick: An error occurred while adding this Brick
error_copying_brick: An error occurred while copying this Brick

error_drone_low_battery: Insert a charged battery and try again.
error_drone_wrong_platform: We cannot run a ARDrone project on your device.
error_rename_incompatible_project: Renaming an incompatible project is not possible.
error_set_description: An error occurred while saving the new description.

error_no_network_multiple_bricks: Following bricks will use the network:

preference_disable_nxt_info_dialog_descr: Program specific NXT settings are not shown when opening a program.
preference_title_mindstorms_nxt_sensors_: The mapping of NXT sensors to ports is program specific and can only be configured for opened programs!
preference_title_drone_properties_settin: The selection of drone configuration properties is program specific and can only be configured within the program.
lego_nxt_sensor_config_info_text: The current program uses Lego Mindstorms NXT bricks or sensors. For proper functionality please connect the sensors to the robot as follows
lego_nxt_sensor_config_dont_show_again: Do not show this message again.
lego_nxt_overwrite_sensor_port_dialog_me: Do you want to overwrite the Sensor on the chosen port?
preference_disable_ev3_info_dialog_descr: Program specific EV3 settings are not shown when opening a program.
preference_title_mindstorms_ev3_sensors_: The mapping of EV3 sensors to ports is program specific and can only be configured for opened programs!
lego_ev3_sensor_config_info_text: The current program uses Lego Mindstorms EV3 bricks or sensors. For proper functionality please connect the sensors to the robot as follows
formula_editor_discard_changes_dialog_me: Do you want to save your changes?
recursive_user_brick_forbidden: Adding UserBrick to UserBrick is not allowed yet!
error_merge_with_self_scene: Current scene and selected scene are the same!
error_different_resolutions: Caution! Different resolutions detected. %1$s has resolution %2$dx%3$d and %4$s has resolution %5$dx%6$d. Using resolution of %1$s.
merge_conflict_variable: Variable %1$s is used in both programs. If programs use the same variable name they cannot be merged. Please rename the variable in one of the programs and try again.
merge_conflict_list: List %1$s is used in both programs. If programs use the same name for their lists they cannot be merged. Please rename the list in one of the programs and try again.
error_flash_front_camera: The flash can be used with the back camera only. Please add a "Use camera" brick and change to your device's back camera.
rating_dialog_text: If you enjoy Pocket Code, please rate us on Google Play!
deletion_alert_text: Deleting a variable that is still in use is dangerous! Are you sure?
progress_upload_dialog_message: Your program gets uploaded to our community page where others can use and download it. You can also download your program as standalone app.
hint_category: All bricks are sorted in categories. Choose the category you are looking for.
hint_bricks: To add a brick to your script tap on the brick you want to use.
hint_brick_added: Short tap on a brick opens the menu to move, copy, delete or add a brick to the backpack. The help option will show you additional information. Drag and drop the brick with a long press.
hint_scripts: The script defines the behaviour of your object. To add bricks to the script tap on the "+" symbol.
hint_looks: Here you can find the different appearances of your object. To add a new look tap on the "+" symbol.
hint_sounds: Here you can add new sounds to your object. Keep in mind to use a brick from the sound category.
hint_objects: Your program consists of different objects that can interact with each other. To add a new object tap on the "+" symbol.
hint_merge: To merge two programs long press on one program to open the menu and tap on 'Merge with'.
hint_stage: Hit the back-button to pause your program. To show axes and the screen size of your phone tap "Axes on".
hint_scenes: A program can consist of different independent scenes. To add a new scene tap on the
crash_dialog_text: Please help to improve Pocket Code by sending us anonymous crash reports!
